member.name: M:Auth.Shared.Profiles.TypeExtensions.IsInterfaceTypeEqualToIMappingCustomSetting(System.Type)
member.summary: Description - 檢查型別是否可以被指定給 IMappingCustomSetting interface Extra - Type.IsAssignableFrom(Type) Determines whether an instance of a specified type c can be assigned to a variable of the current type. 給予另外一個型別
